channel.title: Blogging on JonTheNerd
channel.description: Recent content in Blogging on JonTheNerd

item.title: Decided it was time to start a blog
item.description: ? I’ve been experimenting with Linux more often lately and have found several blogs out there to be very helpful. I’ve stumbled upon some pretty good information and hope to post it here when I stumble upon it from time to time.Initially I considered paying for hosting on my own blog - just to learn the ins and outs of Wordpress or CMS Made Simple. But the truth of the matter is - I’m more interested in tinkering with the technology than coming up with sample content.
